debug.title: Debug Log
debug.description: Enables additional output (debug) in the log.

warn.title: Warn Log
warn.description: Enables additional output (warn) in the log.

error.title: Error Log
error.description: Enables additional output (error) in the log.

extendedError.title: Extended Error Log
extendedError.description: Enables additional output (detailed error) in the log.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.error } catch(e){ return false }

active.title: Active
active.description: If enabled, the device will be exposed to HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the device name for display in the Home app.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

username.title: Username
username.description: Username to log in to your FritzBox.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to log in to your FritzBox.

igd.title: IGD
igd.description: Enables IGD endpoint on requests. Please disable if device seems to be offline in Apple Home.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Set the manufacturer name for display in the Home app.

model.name: Model
model.description: Set the model for display in the Home app.

serialNumber.name: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: Set the serial number for display in the Home app.

oldFW.title: Old Firmware
oldFW.description: If you have problems with device LED turn on this option.

wifiUnits.title: Wifi Units
wifiUnits.description: The amount of available wifi units (only 2.4Ghz = 1 unit / 1x 2.4Ghz and 1x 5Ghz = 2 units / 1x 2.4Ghz and 2x 5Ghz = 3 units and so on)

master.title: Master Device
master.description: Enables this device as master device. Only ONE device can be checked as master device!

condition.functionBody: try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

readOnly.title: Read Only
readOnly.description: If enabled, the switch will not trigger on switching on/off.

hide.title: Hide Switch
hide.description: If enabled, the switch and all his characteristics will not be exposed to Apple Home. (Options like Wifi etc. must be set to Switch to be visible in Apple Home)

condition.functionBody: try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

wifi_2ghz.title: Wifi 2.4GHZ
wifi_2ghz.description: Enables Wifi 2.4GHZ as Switch or Characteristic.

wifi_5ghz.title: Wifi 5GHZ
wifi_5ghz.description: Enables Wifi 5GHZ as Switch or Characteristic.

wifi_guest.title: Wifi Guest
wifi_guest.description: Enables Wifi Guest as Switch or Characteristic.

wps.title: WPS

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].master === true;

wps.description: Enables WPS as Switch or Characteristic. (Only for Master Device)

dect.title: DECT

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].master === true;

dect.description: Enables DECT as Switch or Characteristic. (Only for Master Device)

aw.title: Answering Machine

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].master === true;

aw.description: Enables Answering Machine as Switch or Characteristic. (Only for Master Device)

deflection.title: Deflection

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].master === true;

deflection.description: Enables Deflection as Switch or Characteristic. (Only for Master Device)

led.title: LED
led.description: Enables LED as Switch or Characteristic.

lock.title: Device Lock
lock.description: Enables Device Lock as Switch or Characteristic.

broadband.title: Broadband

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].master === true;

broadband.description: Enables Broadband as Characteristic. (Only for Master Device)

condition.functionBody: return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].connection !== 'repeater';

active.title: Active
active.description: If enabled, the user will be exposed to HomeKit as motion/occupancy sensor.

blockTelegram.title: Block Telegram
blockTelegram.description: Enable this, if you don't want telegram notifications for this user.

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the device name for display in the Home app.

address.title: Address
address.description: The IP/MAC address of the device.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.presence[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

accType.title: Accessory Type
accType.description: The accessory type of the device.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.presence[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

ping.title: Ping
ping.description: Enable this, to additionally ping the device if the status is not recognized correctly by the FritzBox.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Some devices deliberately disconnect from the network once the screen is turned off to save power. Ping works by keeping track of the last time a device was seen, and comparing that to a threshold value (in minutes). (Default: 15min)

condition.functionBody: try { return model.presence[arrayIndices[0]].ping } catch(e){ return false }

onDelay.title: Delay on detection
onDelay.description: Delay timer (s) before switching to detected.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.presence[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

offDelay.title: Delay on NO detection
offDelay.description: Delay timer (s) before switching to NOT detected.

active.title: Active
active.description: If enabled, the device will be exposed to HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the device name for display in the Home app.

address.title: Address
address.description: The MAC address of the device.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.wol[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

active.title: Active
active.description: If enabled, the device will be exposed to HomeKit.

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the device name for display in the Home app. If it is a grouped device, please enter the name of the group as defined in FritzBox.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].active && !model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].group } catch(e){ return false }

readOnly.title: Read Only
readOnly.description: If enabled, the device/group will not trigger on switching on/off.

condition.functionBody: try { model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb' } catch(e){ return false }

group.title: Grouped Device
group.description: Enable this if you want to expose a group instead of a smarthome device.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }

energy.title: Power Meter

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb';

energy.description: Enable this, if the device(s) has a built in power meter. The switch will be exposed as an outlet accessory instead of a switch accessory with FakeGato functionality to HomeKit.

startValue.title: Start Value

condition.functionBody: return (model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb') && model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].energy;

startValue.description: Current power consumption when the device is active. Used for notification via telegram when started (current power consumption above this value) or ended (current power consumption below this value).

externTemperatureSensor.title: Use Extern Temperature Sensor

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat';

externTemperatureSensor.description: Enable this, if you want to show the temperature value from the extern temperature sensor setted up in your FritzBox GUI as the current temperature.

temperature.title: Temperature Sensor

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'button' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb';

temperature.description: Enable this, if the device(s) has a built in temperature sensor. This exposes an additional temperature sensor as an accessory to HomeKit.

humidity.title: Humidity Sensor

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'button' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb';

humidity.description: Enable this, if the device(s) has a built in humidty sensor. This exposes an additional humidty sensor as an accessory to HomeKit.

window.title: Window Sensor

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat';

window.description: Enable this, if the device has a built in window open function. This exposes an additional window (contact) as an accessory to HomeKit.

openWindow.title: Open Window Switch

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat';

openWindow.description: Enable this, if the device has a built in window open function. This exposes an additional open window (switch) as an accessory to HomeKit to trigger open/close window.

brightness.title: Brightness

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'lightbulb' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'lightbulb' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb';

brightness.description: Enable this, if the lightbulb has a brightness adjustment functionality. This will enable brightness adjustment through HomeKit.

color.title: Color

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'lightbulb' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'lightbulb' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'switch-lightbulb';

color.description: Enable this, if the lightbulb has a color adjustment functionality. This will enable color adjustment through HomeKit.

battery.title: Battery

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'thermostat' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'window' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'temperature' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'contact' || model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accTypeGroup === 'thermostat';

battery.description: Enable this, if the device has a built in battery sensor. This shows additional battery information within the accessory.

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'button';

longPress.title: Long Press

condition.functionBody: return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].accType === 'button';

longPress.description: Enable this if your button also supports 'long press'.

accTypeGroup.title: Accessory Types (Group)

condition.functionBody: try { return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].active && model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].group } catch(e){ return false }

accTypeGroup.description: The accessory type of the device(s) in the group.

accType.title: Accessory Type

condition.functionBody: try { return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].active && !model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].group } catch(e){ return false }

accType.description: The accessory type of the device.

countryPrefix.description: If your FritzBox does not provide VOIP, please enter your country prefix (eg 49, 0049 or +49).

cityPrefix.title: City Prefix

condition.functionBody: try { return model.callmonitor.active } catch(e){ return false }

cityPrefix.description: If your FritzBox does not provide VOIP, please enter your city prefix (eg 030).

condition.functionBody: try { return model.callmonitor.active } catch(e){ return false }

items.title: Number
items.description: Number to filter for incoming calls. (If a number is given, the accessory will only trigger if the number matches)

items.title: Number
items.description: Number to filter for incoming calls only to the defined (home) number specified in the array. (If a number is given, the accessory will only trigger if the number matches)

condition.functionBody: try { return model.callmonitor.active } catch(e){ return false }

items.title: Number
items.description: Number to filter for outgoing calls only from the defined (home) number specified in the array. (If a number is given, the accessory will only trigger if the number matches)

active.title: Active
active.description: If enabled, a switch/characteristic will be exposed to Apple Home to toggle target fallback internet option.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.extras.fallbackInternet.active } catch(e){ return false }

onState.title: On State

condition.functionBody: try { return model.extras.fallbackInternet.active } catch(e){ return false }

onState.description: Because Fritzbox provides 4 options how to handle fallback, you can enter here a user defined option (1 = Internet access via mobile active, 2 = Fallback Mode for DSL, 3 = Fallback Mode for DSL/WAN, 4 = Internet access via mobile deactive) what should happen when the switch is turned on OR when the status 'ON' should be detected.

offState.title: Off State

condition.functionBody: try { return model.extras.fallbackInternet.active } catch(e){ return false }

offState.description: Because Fritzbox provides 4 options how to handle fallback, you can enter here a user defined option (1 = Internet access via mobile active, 2 = Fallback Mode for DSL, 3 = Fallback Mode for DSL/WAN, 4 = Internet access via mobile deactive) what should happen when the switch is turned off OR when the status 'OFF' should be detected.

accType.title: Accessory Type

condition.functionBody: try { return model.extras.fallbackInternet.active } catch(e){ return false }

accType.description: The accessory type of the device.

anyone.title: Anyone Sensor

guest.title: Guest Sensor

accType.title: Accessory Type
accType.description: The accessory type of the anyone/guest sensor.

on.title: On Script
on.description: Script to execute on starting reboot.

off.title: Off Script
off.description: Script to execute after reboot finished.

timer.title: Polling Timer
timer.description: Timer to refresh data on background.

timerSmarthomeButtons.title: Polling Timer for Smarthome Buttons
timerSmarthomeButtons.description: Timer to refresh data on background.

items.title: Name/Type/Catagory
items.description: Name/Type/Catagory of the device to exclude from polling.

condition.functionBody: try { return model.telegram.active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.telegram.active } catch(e){ return false }

user_in.title: User Detected
user_in.description: Message if user detected. (Hint: @ will be replaced with accessory name)

user_out.title: User Not Detected
user_out.description: Message if user not detected anymore. (Hint: @ will be replaced with accessory name)

guest_in.title: Guest Detected
guest_in.description: Message if someone connected to guest wlan.

guest_out.title: Guest Not Detected
guest_out.description: Message if no one connected to guest wlan.

incoming.title: Incoming Call
incoming.description: Message for incoming call. (Hint: @ will be replaced with caller name/number and % will be replaced with your home nr.)

outgoing.title: Outgoing Call
outgoing.description: Message for outgoing call. (Hint: @ will be replaced with caller name/number and % will be replaced with your home nr.)

disconnected.title: Call disconnected
disconnected.description: Message if call disconnected. (Hint: @ will be replaced with caller name/number and % will be replaced with your home nr.)

start.title: Start
start.description: Message if reboot started/device not reachable.

on.title: Detected
on.description: Message if device detected on network. (Hint: @ will be replaced with device name)

off.title: Not Detected
off.description: Message if device NOT detected on network. (Hint: @ will be replaced with device name)

started.title: Started
started.description: Message when device started. (Current consumption above or equal startValue)

finished.title: Finished
finished.description: Message when device finished. (Current consumption below startValue)

condition.functionBody: try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.devices[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.presence[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
try { return model.smarthome[arrayIndices[0]].active } catch(e){ return false }
return model.telegram.active === true;
